DataElement.preferredName: Plan Study Activity Status Date and Time Range ISO21090.IVL.TS.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation._Set of consecutive values of an ordered base datatype of the type TS.
